item.title: The normal adult EEG
item.description: The normal adult EEG # Understanding the components of the typical EEG is essential in order to cultivate proficiency in analyzing the atypical findings. Within the subsequent discourse, the frequency ranges and specific wave patterns present in the standard adult EEG will be delineated for both wakefulness and sleep stages ALPHA ACTIVITY #
